definition: structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished

sentences.english: It was easily good enough for pole so that was the main thing.
sentences.chinese: 那一圈跑得不錯，足以使我獲得杆位，那是最主要的。

sentences.english: John has a windfall . It surprises his wife greatly .
sentences.chinese: 約翰意外獲得一筆財富，使他夫人大喫一驚。

sentences.english: The next step is to desaturate the layer that will take on the bloom effect.
sentences.chinese: 下一步是對圖層進行去飽和，圖層將獲得輝光效果。

sentences.english: Slug test is a new method to obtain aquifer parameters.
sentences.chinese: 重錘試驗是一種獲得含水層水文地質參數的新方法。

sentences.english: Chihiro has thus been recognized by everyone to achieve their value.
sentences.chinese: 千尋也因此獲得衆人的認可，實現了自己的價值。

sentences.english: The reason I didn't score any points last year was because we were gamblers.
sentences.chinese: 去年我沒有獲得任何積分的原因是我們是賭棍。

sentences.english: He and his family will also be getting food from the charity.
sentences.chinese: 他和他的家人也將通過慈善組織獲得食物。

sentences.english: DGCA category I rating earned in 2007.
sentences.chinese: 民航總局第一類在2007年獲得評級。

sentences.english: The young boxer has copped the prize of the first round.
sentences.chinese: 這位年輕的拳擊手已獲得了第一回合的勝利。

sentences.english: The parameter values can also be derived from values in previous tasks in the workflow.
sentences.chinese: 這些參數值也可從工作流內之前的任務中獲得。

sentences.english: Chronic conditions are managed equally well with chiropractic or yoga.
sentences.chinese: 慢性病通過脊神經療法或者瑜伽均可獲得顯著療效。

sentences.english: Each time experiment was performed, he would check and recheck the results obtained.
sentences.chinese: 每次做實驗時，他總是對所獲得的結果檢查兩遍。

sentences.english: It seemed as if they derived some sort of twisted pleasure from this brotherly fighting.
sentences.chinese: 這種兄弟相殘似乎使他們獲得了某種扭曲的快感。

sentences.english: The scientists took tissues from fetal liver, and lymph glands .
sentences.chinese: 科學家從胎兒肝和淋巴腺獲得組織。

sentences.english: It aims to improve the useability of sensor uncertain data stream and gain more information from it.
sentences.chinese: 目的在於從不確定傳感器數據流中獲得更多有用信息。

sentences.english: By exposing under different light filters, photographs with different image contrast can be obtained.
sentences.chinese: 曝光時使用不同濾色鏡即可獲得影像反差不同的照片。

definition: by means of/through/via/to pass through/to get through/to adopt/to pass (a bill or inspection etc)/to switch over
to create/to bring about/to produce/to set (a record)
to fight for/to strive for/to win over
to advance/to conduct/underway/in progress/to do/to carry out/to carry on/to execute
to rely on/to depend on/by means of/thanks to/sth that one relies on/also written 憑借|凭借[ping2 jie4]
